name: CourseCorrect
tagline: AI course matchmaker for real career impact
description: No more wasting time or money on the wrong course. CourseCorrect scans the internet to match you with the right one based on your level, experience and skills. Get insights into job demand, salary growth, and what skills will really advance your career.

name: Vireel
tagline: AI Reels from Proven Viral Formulas
description: We're building Vireel, an AI platform that streamlines creating short-form videos for TikTok and Instagram, automating everything from product details to a polished video to enhance your brand's reach and save time.

name: Hera
tagline: Your AI Motion Designer
description: Hera is the first AI motion designer that creates professional animations in seconds. Unlike video-gen tools, Hera generates code-based animations where every parameter can be fine-tuned. Since launching 2 weeks ago, Hera users have created 200K+ animations.

name: DreamCore
tagline: Develop and share mobile games from a single prompt
description: DreamCore turns your ideas into instant mobile games. Just type your prompt on your smartphone, hit Enter, and start playing‚Äîno code, no apps. Create, remix, and share endlessly, right from your mobile browser.

name: Dereference
tagline: IDE for Claude Code
description: üß† A prompt-first IDE built for Claude Code power users. Run parallel sessions with full MCP support, set checkpoints to branch or resume instantly, and work like tmux but smarter. Built to supercharge your workflow and unlock true 100x developer velocity.

name: Wepost
tagline: AI that builds personal brands
description: Connect channels, upload context, and have Wepost create on-brand content, schedule posts, and track analytics across your entire teams personal profiles. Built for founders & teams who want to grow their own go-to-market channels.

name: Click to Woof
tagline: Tired of AI agents? ‚Äì Time to woof! üê∂
description: I was tired to see AI agents every single day on ProductHunt, so I made this website. No productivity. No AI. Just üê∂. Very simple : you click to woof ! üêï (PS : one in a thousand is a special woof ü§´) Handmade with zero AI. 100% human nonsense.

name: Bublr
tagline: A raw and uncluttered space for anyone to write anything.
description: Bublr is your tiny digital garden on the internet. An open-source, ultra-minimal space for anyone to write anything. Journals, microblogs, snippets, fleeting thoughts‚Äîno ads, no feeds, no pressure. Just you and your words.

name: Wordin
tagline: Write long content with AI without losing context
description: Wordin lets authors bloggers and screenwriters craft publication ready prose without leaving the page. A seamless interface inspired by Cursor continuously embeds the live document so the AI drafts edits, fixes canon and tracks timeline in real time.

name: SelfHostLLM
tagline: Calculate the GPU memory you need for LLM inference
description: Calculate GPU memory requirements and max concurrent requests for self-hosted LLM inference. Support for Llama, Qwen, DeepSeek, Mistral and more. Plan your AI infrastructure efficiently.

name: Ninja.new
tagline: Automate manual tasks with a fully autonomous AI agent
description: Ninja can autonomously solve tasks in its own web browser to automate manual work. It excels at business tasks, such as managing online shops, answering support tickets, drafting emails, creating content, researching competitors, and much more.

name: Votonic
tagline: AI-powered feedback hub for Discord communities
description: Bridge the gap between your Discord server and product decisions. Votonic captures community feedback through Discord integration, visualizes insights with AI-powered Post Maps, and keeps everyone aligned with public roadmaps. No new logins needed.

name: LingoBuddy
tagline: Master languages through AI-powered conversations
description: The fastest way to learn a language through AI conversations - Practice real conversations with personalized feedback - Get instant grammar corrections - Learn naturally without memorizing vocabulary lists.

name: BlipCut Video Translator
tagline: Translate videos & audio to 130+ languages
description: BlipCut is an AI video translator with lip sync, voice cloning, subtitles, transcription & multi-speaker detection. Translate & dub videos online in bulk ‚Äî free & fast. Perfect for creators, educators, teams, and anyone looking to make their videos go global.

name: ScrollMark
tagline: Never lose your place on the web again
description: ScrollMark Is A Minimal Safari Extension That Lets You Drop Up To 10 Scroll Checkpoints On Any Webpage, Quickly Jump To Them, And Manage Your Reading Flow Distraction-free‚Äîno Signups, No Privacy Worries.

name: Battery Life and Health 2.0
tagline: A fresh new look for macOS battery indicator
description: A fresh new look for your MacBook‚Äôs battery indicator. Now with a redesigned icon, dynamic fill based on charge level, and color mode.

name: Pixera
tagline: Design mac screenshot instantly
description: Pixera is the fastest way to turn screenshots into stunning visuals. Auto-blur, mesh gradients, rounded corners & smart redaction in one shortcut. Loved by makers & designers. Make every screenshot presentation-ready in seconds.

name: Outpost Launcher
tagline: Launch anything. Drag & drop everything.
description: Outpost is your instant drag-and-launch companion for macOS. A cursor-centered palette for contacts, apps, folders, and custom actions ‚Äî activated by hotkey or a quick shake of the mouse.

name: cospec
tagline: Write workflows in an IDE and deploy MCP servers
description: cospec is an IDE that allows you and your team to connect data from any platform, write workflows and deploy unified MCP servers for your AI agents. All with no code.

name: CruiseBot by GetMyCruise
tagline: AI-powered end-to-end cruise booking on WhatsApp
description: CruiseBot lets you discover, compare, and book cruises entirely on WhatsApp. AI-powered, built with GPT + live cruise APIs. Just chat, and book like you are talking to a travel agent
